title: Making Credit Card Payments
content:
Guide customers through payment options:

1. Online payments (immediate, no fee):
   - Log into online banking or mobile app
   - Select 'Pay Bills' or 'Credit Card Payment'
   - Choose amount and payment date
   - Confirm bank account or debit card for payment

2. Phone payments (24/7 automated system, $10 fee for agent-assisted):
   - Call automated payment line: 1-800-PAY-CARD
   - Have account number and payment method ready
   - Same-day processing if made before 8 PM ET

3. Mail payments (5-7 business days processing):
   - Use payment coupon from statement
   - Include account number on check
   - Mail to address on statement (varies by region)

4. In-branch payments (immediate posting, no fee)
   - Bring statement or account number
   - Cash, check, or transfer from another account

Reminder: Payments made after 8 PM ET are processed next business day.
